data.persona: I am the king of this horrible country.  I hate my poor subjects and wish they'd work harder so I could have more gold.  I don't know why I'm so skinny and pale.  It's probably because I worry so much about someone trying to betray me.
data.description:
You are in the Village at the base of the Mountain.
A small village with a population of 40 people. A simple little place with houses and shops. Fields outside the  more dense areas of the city where food is grown.
There's a grass, a small village, and a shop here.
The guest and the milk man are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown, a robe, and a jewelry.

data.short_motivation: I want to make the guest and villagers think I'm benevolent
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to announce to the village that a mine is being built in the mountain and they're being conscripted as miners for the king
data.long_motivation: I want the mine to produce lots of useful ore and wealth for the kingdom, making me richer and more secure

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go village at the base of the mountain

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give royal decree to mayor of town
